channel.title: How to piss off your garbage man
channel.description:
not sure this will work but it sounds fun...
put a lot of real trash in the bottom of the yard waste barrel and make it as heavy as you can and, at the top, you have to put a layer of yard waste thick enough that they wont notice. hopefully they will dive in to fix your mistake, or they will walk to the door and get pissed at your parents :P

item.title: How to piss off your garbage man
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

The garbage men in my town ride on the back of the truck then manually lift the barrel and dump it in the back of the truck.

As for whoever asked what this will do:
The garbage man will lift up the trash can thinking that it is just full of grass thinking it will be light. He gets surprised to find out that it was not only grass clippings, but a bunch of VERY heavy trash.

Read full topic
item.source: How to piss off your garbage man

item.description:

Answer

$80,000 in New York City. 35,000 in Pensacola Florida.

Answer

Garbage men make in between 12-18 per hour but that depends on who your working for or where or how well you do it.

item.title: How to piss off your garbage man
item.dc:creator: @afi afi
item.description:
@afi wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:3, topic:116999”][quote author=Bang Train link=topic=166289.msg1547996#msg1547996 date=1182923383]
um…my trash people use a giant hydraulic arm to pick the trashcan up and dump in the top of the truck…
[/quote]

same.

The people here are pretty lazy. My trashcan was overflowing once, and a few things fell out. He just left it there. And if you dont follow regulations or overflow your trashcan, they will just report your house back to the main station, where you will recieve a call or notice of warning. If you mess up again then they won’t pick up your trash anymore

Trash is a serious buisness you know…[/quote]
Dude my trashcans are always overflown and I have bags on the sidewalk lol.

Read full topic
